Title: Episode #4.7
Writer: Chris Ryan (based on the book by), Simon Burke, Ben Newman
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Robson Green, Michelle Lukes
Plot: Decoding the NATO hard drive would breach all NATO security. Scott and Stonebridge go undercover in a Russian prison to prevent a hacker from breaching the firewalls of the hard drive. Stonebridge continues to struggle with his focus.
